column4: in ubuntu, do i have to use groupmod usermod etc, or can i type directly into /etc/group to add my users to groups?
you can do all of those things.  Or just use "adduser" and "deluser" which are probably easier and less error-prone

yes but say i want to add a user to a group, can i just add him to the right group in /etc/group or do i have to use the tool for it? im worried the tool may update some other files that i dont know about
like I said, you can just edit /etc/group if you want, but I'd suggest you use adduser/deluser
